features.featureTitle: Enhance the Budget Planner experience to be more advanced and realistic by adding additional financial insights and visualizations: include at least one line chart (e.g., cashflow/savings projection over time) and ensure a clear pie chart breakdown is presented; add explicit guidance sections that answer how to improve personal finances with actionable suggestions on saving, investing, and next steps based on the user inputs.

Increase the quiz question library to at least 100 unique finance quiz questions and ensure the app actually uses them (i.e., the quiz initialization and quiz flow should reflect 100+ total questions rather than only a small set). Questions must cover a broad set of personal finance topics, including saving strategies, budgeting methods, investing for beginners, stock market basics, mutual funds, SIP investing, and emergency funds.
